description: Try our easy to follow Beef Burgundy Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef Burgundy Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g middle bacon rashers, rind removed, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Toss diced beef in flour to coat lightly. Heat 1 tbsp of the oil in a large heatproof casserole. Add Kaiser fleisch or bacon and onions. Cook until golden. Remove.
Heat remaining oil and cook beef in batches until well browned. Remove.

Drain off any oil. Add tomato paste, wine, consomme stock and bouquet garni and stir with a wooden spoon to loosen sediment on base of pan. Return cooked ingredients to pan and add mushrooms. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to a gentle simmer, partially cover and cook for 1 1/2-2 hrs, until beef is very tender. Remove the bouquet garni.

Divide mixture between 6 x 2-cup ovenproof dishes. Cover each with pastry, pressing edges to seal and trim off the excess. Cut a few steam holes in the top. Bake for 15 mins until golden brown. Serve.
